# Select a text

```{r}
manuscript_meta %>% 
  relocate(Catalogue_id, .after = last_col()) %>% 
  select(-googlesheet_link, -people_with_write_access) %>% 
  filter(!(Catalogue_id %in% c("test_text_1", "test_text_2"))) %>% 
  arrange(desc(Date_added)) %>% 
  mutate_all(~str_c("<a href='/manuscripts/", Catalogue_id, "/'>", ., "</a>")) %>% 
  relocate(Dating, Catalogue_id) %>% 
  datatable(rownames = FALSE, escape = FALSE, class = 'row-border', 
            extensions = 'FixedColumns', 
            options = list(pageLength = 10, dom = 't', scrollX = TRUE, scrollCollapse = TRUE)) 
```
